searchUrl.title: Search URL (Optional)
searchUrl.description: Direct ZipRecruiter search URL to scrape from. If provided, other search parameters will be ignored. Example: https://www.ziprecruiter.com/jobs-search?location=New+York%2C+NY&search=software+engineer

searchQuery.title: Search Query / Keywords
searchQuery.description: Job title or keywords to search for (e.g., 'software engineer', 'data analyst', 'product manager'). Required if searchUrl is not provided.

location.title: Location
location.description: Location to search for jobs (e.g., 'New York, NY', 'California', 'Remote'). Recommended for best results.

maxJobs.title: Maximum Jobs
maxJobs.description: Maximum number of job listings to scrape (0 = unlimited). Default is 20.

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of result pages to scan. Used as a safety cap, especially when maxJobs is 0 (unlimited).

daysBack.title: Posted Within (Days)
daysBack.description: Filter by how recently jobs were posted

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for bypassing anti-bot protection. Residential proxies highly recommended for ZipRecruiter.
